name: 80's Red Vintage Leather Tee
description:
OK, so as you can see from the photos this leather tee is totally red hot!! This is definatley a piece that will add a point of difference to your look this summer. Made from gorgeous soft leather with a snake skin print panel, this top willl take your wardrobe to the next level! The colour is such a bright, rich red you will definatley stand out in this one. Wear with leggings and slouch boots or with high waisted distressed denim shorts and platforms!! 
HOT HOT HOT!
Size 12 but would fit size 6-12.

name: 80's Vintage Brown Wash Leather Tee
description:
Ok so as you can see from the photos this leather tee is hot!! This is definatyly a piece that will add a point of difference to your look this summer. Made from gorgeous soft leather with washed out brown panels, this top willl take your wardrobe to the next level! The colour is such an easy colour to match with everything in your wadrobe. Wear with leggings and slouch boots or with high waisted distressed denim shorts and platforms!! HOT HOT HOT!
Size: 12 but would fit 6-12.
